data.scheme_name: Agriculture and Processed Foods Export Promotion Scheme of APEDA  - Quality Development  - Testing of Water, Soil, Residues of Pesticide, Veterinary Drugs, Hormones, Toxins, Heavy Metal, Microbial Count etc.  - Existing
data.benefits: Scheme provides assistance of 50% of the total cost upto max. of Rs. 20 lakh for Ensuring quality and food safety compliance.
data.eligibility: All APEDA registered Exporters are eligible to apply for assistance.
data.conditions:
The application should be accompanied by following documents: Linkage sheet.
In case linkage sheet is submitted offline, the same should be duly certified by a practising Chartered Accountant with UDIN Number and CA certificate.
data.beneficiaries: All APEDA registered Exporters are eligible to apply for assistance.
data.prerequisites:
The application should be accompanied by following documents: Linkage sheet.
In case linkage sheet is submitted offline, the same should be duly certified by a practising Chartered Accountant with UDIN Number and CA certificate.
data.nodal_agency: Agricultural and Processed Foods Products Export Development Authority (APEDA)
data.context: This scheme is introduced for growth of agro-industries and export of agricultural products in the value chain. The scheme component covers both fresh produce and processed food products.
data.objective: The primary objective of APEDA is to undertake the development and promotion of export of mentioned products.
data.description: Scheme provides assistance of 50% of the total cost to a ceiling of Rs.0.505 lakh per sample and the upper ceiling  per beneficiary is Rs. 20 lakh for Ensuring quality and food safety compliance.
data.how_to_apply: The applicant can apply through the link : https://apeda.gov.in/apedawebsite/miscellaneous/Tender.htm
data.funding_facilitator: Agricultural and Processed Foods Products Export Development Authority (APEDA)
data.funding_mechanism: The assistance amount shall be released to the beneficiary, direct in their account as per detail submitted in the application.
data.additional_info: In-principle approval (IPA) is not required for this component.
data.checklist_info_a:
1. Annexure 3* (In case linkage sheet is submitted offline, the same should be duly certified by a practising Chartered Accountant with UDIN No.)
2. Annexure 5*
3. Copy of test report 
4. Commercial invoice and other supporting export documents related to the consignment for which test charges are being claimed 
5. Bank statement reflecting payment made to lab 
6. Any other document as sought by APEDA
*Following document is provided in the below mentioned link.
data.checklist_info_d:
Address:

data.beneficiary: Agro-Based Industry  - Proprietorship, Partnership, Limited Liability Partnership (LLP), Private Limited Company, Others  - All Locations  - All MSMEs, All Non MSMEs
data.lifecycle: Establishment of brand and enhance quality output
